name: Samsung Galaxy S20 Dual Sim 128GB
title: Samsung Galaxy S20 (SM-G980F/DS) Dual SIM 128GB, Factory Unlocked GSM, International Version
aboutItem1: Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carrier such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint
aboutItem2: Please check if your GSM cellular carrier supports the bands for this model before purchasing, LTE may not be available in all areas
aboutItem3: This device may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international items
aboutItem4: Device may come with foreign charger however seller will provide a US travel socket separately
ReviewTitle: Most Unreal Phone ive ever had!
ReviewDesc: This phone is not a phone its a computer in yer pocket. its so great! I am not a phone guy, and bought because my daughter, and friends, co workers, etc said its hard impossible to get a hold of me. My old phone was so slow. This has it all, definate buy. I even checked a youtube video on side by side comparison of Xynos and Snapdragon phone and they are basically the same. I keep finding new features with this thing. The super fast charging is epic. I dont know where to start, but this is a definite MUST BUY if you need a phone. I hope there is some left.
